>>59261517
No no, you don't get it. It's supposed to be a word game. You see, most spanish speaking vtubers started out with static models once they reincarnated. We among the community often joke about them using png image formats for their models. On the other hand the letter "ñ" is pretty much exclusive to the spanish language so here comes the joke: we replaced the N in PNG for a Ñ, giving place to /PÑG/ JAJAJAJAJAJA
What's not to like? It's comedy gold!
Please ignore the fact that most of the vtubers we talk about there have long their statics models behind in favor of properly rigged dynamic models.

>>59263203
It is, retard. It illustrates how the psyche of the splitshitter works.

To be fair, you have to have a very high IQ to understand /PÑG/. The humour is extremely subtle, and without a solid grasp of Spanish linguistic nuances most of the jokes will go over a typical viewer's head. There's also the png-live2d, which is deftly woven into their characterisation- their choice of using a static PNG model draws heavily from the community's inside jokes, for instance. The fans understand this stuff; they have the intellectual capacity to truly appreciate the depths of these jokes, to realise that they're not just funny- they say something deep about the LATAM Vtuber CULTURE. As a consequence people who dislike /PÑG/ jokes truly ARE idiots- of course they wouldn't appreciate, for instance, the humour in the community's iconic catchphrase "Ganamos," which itself is a cryptic reference to the unique characteristics of the PNG gang. I'm smirking right now just imagining one of those addlepated simpletons scratching their heads in confusion as the /PÑG/ anons's genius wit unfolds itself on their computer screens. What fools.. how I pity them.
And yes, by the way, I DO have a /PÑG/ tattoo. And no, you cannot see it. It's for the ladies' eyes only- and even then they have to demonstrate that they're within 5 IQ points of my own (preferably lower) beforehand. Nothin personnel kid.

>>59261355
There he is. There he goes again. Look, everyone! He posted it once again! Isn’t he just the funniest guy around?! Oh my God.
I can almost see your pathetic overweight frame glowing in the dark, lit by your computer screen which is the only source of light in your room, giggling like a like girl as you once again type your little /PÑG/ thread up and fill in the captcha. Or maybe you don’t even fill in the captcha. Maybe you’re such a disgusting NEET that you actually paid for a 4chan pass, so you just choose the picture. Oh, and we all know the pun. The “epic” Ñ joke, isn’t it? I imagine you little shit laughing so hard as you click it that you drop your Doritos on the floor, but it’s ok, your mother will clean it up in the morning. Oh, that’s right. Did I fail to mention? You live with your mother. You are a fat fucking fuckup, she’s probably so sick of you already. So sick of having to do everything for you all goddamn day, every day, for a grown man who spends all his time on 4chan posting about some fucking spic vtubers. Just imagine this. She had you, and then she thought you were gonna be a scientist or an astronaut or something grand, and then you became a NEET. A pathetic splitnigger NEET. She probably cries herself to sleep everyday thinking about how bad it is and how she wishes she could just disappear. She can’t even try to talk with you because all you say is “REAL THREAD” You’ve become a parody of your own self. And that’s all you are. A sad little man laughing in the dark by himself as he prepares to indulge in the same old dance that he’s done a million times now. And that’s all you’ll ever be.
He's truly mindbroken.
